about_the_game:
Back To Coffin is a 1-4 people CO-OP horror game
As a vampire hunter in a universe terrorized by vampires, you can work alone or with your team to use various magical equipments to find the vampire's class and send it back to its coffin.

Realistic Graphics
With the power of Unreal Engine 5, the game features specially designed maps that are waiting to give you a fun and horror-filled experience.

Customization
Customize your own unique hunter and catch the vampires!

Different Enemies
In each game, capture a random vampire from 20 different specially designed vampires

Interactive Maps
Pay attention as you move through the map. Each map has various interactions that will affect your gameplay. Keep your eyes peeled to find secret passages and avoid traps!

Unique Designs
Use magical equipment with unique designs to find the vampire and put him in its coffin!

Co-Op
Defeat the vampire alone or together with the help of up to 3 friends.
